text: Jahron Anthony Brathwaite (born July 3, 1993), known as PartyNextDoor, is a Canadian R&B; singer-songwriter and record producer. He was the first artist to sign with Drake's record label OVO Sound. His first extended play was released with strong positive reviews. He is also known for writing Rihanna's 2016 single "Work" and DJ Khaled's 2017 single "Wild Thoughts". PartyNextDoor has also worked with Kanye West, Usher, Christina Aguilera, Post Malone, City Girls, Ne-Yo, Justine Skye, and Jay Park.' ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian rappers Category:Canadian singer- songwriters Category:Canadian record producers Category:Canadian hip hop singers Category:Singers from Toronto Category:Writers from Toronto Category:Musicians from Toronto Category:Businesspeople from Toronto
title: PartyNextDoor
